snippet.title: BUGGY BATTLE GAME TRAILER
snippet.description:
↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓GET FREE DOWNLOAD!! LINKS BELOW ↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓
https://gamejolt.com/games/buggybattle/471935
https://dingsbumsproductions.itch.io/buggy-battle
https://www.kartridge.com/games/dingsbumsprod/buggy-battle

In a world full of trigger-happy meerkats, guerrilla aliens, grenade-throwing octopuses, bombs and asteroids falling from the sky, swirling dust devils, lurking mines, nasty spikes and really bad weather, only one buggy can survive. Fight in battle ,collect loot, buy weapons, armor, shields and modifications and become champion in BUGGY BATTLE. 

Minimum Requirements:

Windows XP, Mac OSX 10.4
Core 2 Duo
4 GB RAM
Intel HD Graphics 3000 with 384 MB of RAM
443 MB of Disk Space
